trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around October 2nd 2012
divs: sighting detailsit was about 5:20pm and i was walking back to my house from the neighbors across the street, when i was looking in the direction of my house and deck on the right side, when this very bright reflective light caught my attention. at first i thought it was a plane simply reflecting the sun that was in the west.i noticed that it was very bright and in a circular shape with no wings or sound. within about three seconds it shrunk down in size to a now reflective\bright dot. in about 2 seconds it just disappeared. i couldnt believe what i just witnessed.i ran inside and grabbed the binoculars to see if i could see it trailing away and saw absolutely nothing in the sky, in the entire area.
Summary: {dr}Bright reflective light or surface that then shrunk and then disappeared.
